source:
%%sql
-- DBXDH.DHT_CAMPUS definition
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.DHT_CAMPUS  (	
	CAMPUS_KEY INTEGER NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_VERSION	INT NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_ID CHAR(8) NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_STATUS VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
	SITE_ID CHAR(8) NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_GROUP CHAR(11),
	PHYSICAL_GEO CHAR(5),
	WORLD_REGION_CODE CHAR(2),
	WORLD_REGION_NAME VARCHAR(60),
	MARKET_TEAM_REGION_CODE CHAR(3),
	MARKET_TEAM_REGION_NAME VARCHAR(60),
	WORK_LOCATION_CODE CHAR(3),
	ADDRESS VARCHAR(200),
	CITY VARCHAR(53),
	STATE_PROVINCE_ID CHAR(3),
	POSTAL_CODE VARCHAR(15),
	COUNTRY_CODE CHAR(2),
	LATITUDE DECIMAL(11,8),
	LONGITUDE DECIMAL(11,8),
	UTC_OFFSET CHAR(9),
	ICU_TIME_ZONE VARCHAR(50),
	PEOPLE_HOUSED_FLAG CHAR(1),
	REMOTE_SUPPORT_FLAG CHAR(1),
	PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_ID CHAR(3),
	PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_NAME VARCHAR(32),
	PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_DESCR VARCHAR(128),
	CAMPUS_OWNERSHIP VARCHAR(40),
	CAMPUS_ACTIVATION_YEAR SMALLINT,
	CAMPUS_INACTIVATION_YEAR SMALLINT,
	SOURCE_SYS_MODIFIED_DT TIMESTAMP,
	PROCESSED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	CURRENT_IND	STRING
,	EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP
,	REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP
,	REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP
,	SOURCE_SYSTEM STRING
,	REC_CHECKSUM STRING
,	REC_STATUS STRING	
,	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP
,	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP
,   ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND STRING
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)
LOCATION 'abfss://etlhubfilestorage@adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/dimensions/DHT_CAMPUS'

-- RESOWW.CAMPUS definition

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE RESOWW.CAMPUS;

CREATE TABLE RESOWW.CAMPUS (
	CAMPUS_KEY INTEGER NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_ID CHAR(8) NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_STATUS VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL,
	SITE_ID CHAR(8) NOT NULL,
	CAMPUS_GROUP CHAR(11),
	PHYSICAL_GEO CHAR(5),
	WORLD_REGION_CODE CHAR(2),
	WORLD_REGION_NAME VARCHAR(60),
	MARKET_TEAM_REGION_CODE CHAR(3),
	MARKET_TEAM_REGION_NAME VARCHAR(60),
	WORK_LOCATION_CODE CHAR(3),
	ADDRESS VARCHAR(200),
	CITY VARCHAR(53),
	STATE_PROVINCE_ID CHAR(3),
	POSTAL_CODE VARCHAR(15),
	COUNTRY_CODE CHAR(2),
	LATITUDE DECIMAL(11,8),
	LONGITUDE DECIMAL(11,8),
	UTC_OFFSET CHAR(9),
	ICU_TIME_ZONE VARCHAR(50),
	PEOPLE_HOUSED_FLAG CHAR(1),
	REMOTE_SUPPORT_FLAG CHAR(1),
	PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_ID CHAR(3),
	PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_NAME VARCHAR(32),
	PRIMARY_CAMPUS_USE_DESCR VARCHAR(128),
	CAMPUS_OWNERSHIP VARCHAR(40),
	CAMPUS_ACTIVATION_YEAR SMALLINT,
	CAMPUS_INACTIVATION_YEAR SMALLINT,
	SOURCE_SYS_MODIFIED_DT TIMESTAMP,
	PROCESSED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	CONSTRAINT SQL200724134412910 PRIMARY KEY (CAMPUS_KEY)
);
CREATE INDEX MARKET_TEAM_REGION_IDX ON RESOWW.CAMPUS (MARKET_TEAM_REGION_CODE);
CREATE INDEX PHYSICAL_GEO_IDX ON RESOWW.CAMPUS (PHYSICAL_GEO);
CREATE INDEX SITE_ID_IDX ON RESOWW.CAMPUS (SITE_ID);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX SQL200724134412900 ON RESOWW.CAMPUS (CAMPUS_KEY);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX SQL200724134412920 ON RESOWW.CAMPUS (CAMPUS_ID);
CREATE INDEX WORLD_REGION_IDX ON RESOWW.CAMPUS (WORLD_REGION_CODE);
